biotools.summary: Compilation of all names of Bacteria and Archaea which have been validly published according to the Bacteriological Code since 1 January 1980, and nomenclatural proposals that have been validly published since then. Was merged with LPSN and replaced by the new LPSN when LPSN was taken over by DSMZ.

bioschemas.name: Prokaryotic Nomenclature up-to-date (PNU)
bioschemas.summary: Compilation of all names of Bacteria and Archaea which have been validly published according to the Bacteriological Code since 1 January 1980, and nomenclatural proposals that have been validly published since then. Was merged with LPSN and replaced by the new LPSN when LPSN was taken over by DSMZ.
